colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B (CES PA GDUNG 'BOD RATNA'I 'PHRENG BA 'DI, ,DUS GSUM RGYAL BA'I YUM MCHOG RJE BTZUN MA'I, ,THUGS RGYUD BSKUL BYED BYIN RLABS DPAG TU MED, ,TSUL 'DIR SGO GSUM GUS PAS 'BAD PAR RIGS, ,DE SKAD DAD LDAN SLOB MAS NAN CHED DU, ,BSKUL TSE 'JAM DBYANGS BLA MA TZONG KHA PAR, ,MI PHYED DAD THOB RJE BTZUN SGROL MA NYID, ,RING NAS LHAG PA'I LHAR BSNYEN GUS STEN PA, ,SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA BLO GROS RGYA MTSOS SBYAR, ,DGE 'DI 'GRO KUN KUN MKHYEN THOB PHYIR BNGO, ,DGE'O, ,)
